selections.name: End Stage
selections.reason: Dominant performer who has won his last three starts at this track, including a 1:17.1 victory last time out. Rates 10+ points clear of this field.

selections.name: L'etoile D'amour
selections.reason: Returns from a break with solid form at Mizusawa. Drawn the rail to get the perfect run.

selections.name: Broad Phylum
selections.reason: Ran a respectable 3rd at this track on Jan 19. Should be fitter for that effort.

selections.name: Ping Pang Pong
selections.reason: Disappointing first run here but had good winning form at Saga prior. Can improve.

selections.name: A Shin Ginger
selections.reason: Posted a strong 1:16.1 when 3rd at this track on Jan 20. That time is superior to rivals here.

selections.name: Cause A Spike
selections.reason: Finished just behind the top pick in the same race (1:16.1). Must be respected on that figure.

selections.name: Egg Scrambled
selections.reason: Consistent type who ran 2nd last start, though in a slower time (1:17.0) than the top two.

selections.name: Dona Epona
selections.reason: Ran a solid 3rd last time out. Competitive if she can overcome the wide draw.

danger_horse.name: Cause A Spike
danger_horse.reason: Ran the same time as the top pick last start and could easily reverse placings.

selections.name: Mino Bell
selections.reason: Ran a strong 2nd at this track on Jan 19 in 1:37.3. That form reads best for this.

selections.name: Trapezium
selections.reason: Won debut impressively over 6f. Steps up in trip but looks to have the class.

selections.name: King's Power
selections.reason: Finished 4th behind Mino Bell last start. Consistent type who should be in the mix.

selections.name: Edono Jet
selections.reason: Consistent form at Urawa. Wide gate is a concern but has the ability.

danger_horse.name: Trapezium
danger_horse.reason: Unexposed winner who could be anything. Major threat.

selections.name: Unsurpassed
selections.reason: Ran a very good 2nd at this track on Jan 20 in 1:16.4. The one to beat on that effort.

selections.name: White Ash
selections.reason: Finished 4th in the same race as the top pick, recording the same time (1:16.4). Big chance.

selections.name: Twilight Dress
selections.reason: In winning form at Urawa. Hard to knock a horse chasing a hat-trick.

selections.name: Kyoei Cerezo
selections.reason: Consistent placer. Ran 3rd here two starts back and 2nd at Kawasaki last time.

danger_horse.name: White Ash
danger_horse.reason: Matched the top pick's time last start and drawn much better.

selections.name: Ryuno Essence
selections.reason: Ran a superb 3rd at this track on Jan 19 in 1:15.0. That time is lengths faster than rivals.

selections.name: Osmanthus
selections.reason: Finished 4th in the same fast race (1:15.0) behind the top pick.

selections.name: Castle Pride
selections.reason: Finished 5th in the key reference race (1:15.0). Should finish close to the top two.

selections.name: Aquanaut
selections.reason: Recent form at Urawa is solid. Place chance if the race falls apart.

danger_horse.name: Osmanthus
danger_horse.reason: Only beaten slightly by the top pick last time. Logical danger.

selections.name: Terminator
selections.reason: Ran a solid 3rd at this track on Jan 20. Form is consistent enough to win this weak affair.

selections.name: Norisuke
selections.reason: Finished 4th just behind the top pick last start. Should be right there again.

selections.name: My Eiger
selections.reason: Drops in from Urawa where he ran 4th. Inside draw helps.

selections.name: Vascularity
selections.reason: Ran okay over 6f last time. Step up in trip might suit.

danger_horse.name: Norisuke
danger_horse.reason: Very little separating him and the top pick on recent form.

selections.name: Pod Buddy
selections.reason: Ran a strong 2nd at this track on Jan 19 in 1:15.0. That is the benchmark form.

selections.name: Happy Warrior
selections.reason: Finished 4th in the same race as the top pick. Drawn well to challenge.

selections.name: Spirit Surge
selections.reason: Ran 2nd last start in 1:15.2. Consistent and must be included.

selections.name: Surreal
selections.reason: Last start winner here in 1:16.1. Time was a bit slower but winning form is good form.

danger_horse.name: Happy Warrior
danger_horse.reason: Ran well in the key reference race. Inside draw is a plus.

selections.name: Copano Howard
selections.reason: Ran 5th in a fast race (1:36.3) last start. Drops into a slightly easier contest here.

selections.name: Billionaire Boy
selections.reason: Ran a good 2nd last start in 1:38.1. Consistent type.

selections.name: Fernanda
selections.reason: Solid Urawa form. Drawn to get a soft run.

selections.name: Lunar South Pole
selections.reason: Won last start in 1:38.1. Confidence is up.

danger_horse.name: Billionaire Boy
danger_horse.reason: Beaten narrowly last time. Major player.

selections.name: Jasper Jet
selections.reason: Won impressively at this track and distance on Jan 20 in 1:57.0. The one to beat.

selections.name: Highest Code
selections.reason: Also a last start winner over this track/dist in similar time (1:57.2). Main danger.

selections.name: Fifties
selections.reason: Ran 2nd at Kawasaki last start and 6th behind the top pick prior. Place chance.

selections.name: Shoken
selections.reason: Finished 3rd behind Jasper Jet last time. Reliable place getter.

danger_horse.name: Highest Code
danger_horse.reason: Won well last start and times are comparable to the favorite.

selections.name: Shadow Duchess
selections.reason: Won last start at this track/dist in 1:01.2. In peak form.

selections.name: Presto Gaudi
selections.reason: Finished 2nd to Shadow Duchess last time. Meet on similar terms.

selections.name: Mana Flash
selections.reason: Drops back to 5f where he has won before. Ran well over 6f last start.

selections.name: Eis Lindy
selections.reason: Ran 3rd in the key reference race behind the top two.

danger_horse.name: Presto Gaudi
danger_horse.reason: Only beaten 0.3L last time. Could turn the tables.

selections.name: Haseno Brian
selections.reason: Ran a solid 3rd at this track on Jan 20 in 1:14.0. That form stands out.

selections.name: Lowell
selections.reason: Resuming from a break but has class. Watch betting.

selections.name: Karlsbad
selections.reason: Solid form at Ohi. Competitive in this grade.

selections.name: Copano Pasadena
selections.reason: Good form over 5f, steps up to 6f. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Lowell
danger_horse.reason: Class runner returning. If ready, he wins.

selections.name: Bouncelight
selections.reason: Ran a strong 2nd at this track on Jan 20 in 1:42.3. The form horse.

selections.name: Star Of Faith
selections.reason: Finished 3rd in the same race as the top pick. Consistent.

selections.name: Inner Steel
selections.reason: Resuming winner. Has a good first-up record.

selections.name: Takara Liner
selections.reason: Finished 5th in the key reference race. Can improve.

danger_horse.name: Inner Steel
danger_horse.reason: Won last start and goes well fresh. Big threat.
